The Reds have had an even worse time of it than the Blues, though, and the Reds have become the dregs of the coliseum: penniless, hopeless, a laughingstock. In the end, they have come so far down that they will do anything to get back up. Anything – including bribery, cheating, and foul play.

180441.name: The Flesh Weavers
180441.description:
From publisher blurb:

The survival of Pitford rests in your hands!

A sandstorm batters the enclosed fort, forcing the characters to lay low. Unable to loot the nearby Great Ruins their money is running out fast, and they're getting thirsty as the last two food and water convoys from the city never made it.

Worse, the storm is tearing gaps in the scrap-built fortress. These openings have not gone unnoticed. Something unspeakable approaches in the biting sandstorm, gathering in numbers and taking advantage of the blinded defenders... an insidious peril that hungers for more than the flesh and fluids of Pitford's citizens. This horror themed module takes place in and around the Quest Path Apartments where the characters rent a humble bunk room. Here, the characters are thrown into the middle of a nightmarish ordeal, where their survival is in question, where their failure could lead to a regionwide catastrophe.

The Flesh Weavers is a heart pounding adventure. It includes a massive basement add-on, as well as an escape tunnel generator, terrible new creature and dozens of its ghastly variants. Players must choose carefully at every turn, weigh their options, and decide whether to be heroes, or bug out. Facing the flesh weavers is only for the brave, the resourceful and the mighty... Pitford's survival depends on it.

The Flesh Weavers uses the Outland System™ game mechanic and requires only The Mutant Epoch hub rules RPG game book to play. Designed for 6 to 8 second to fourth rank characters, this module takes place in Pitford in the Crossroads Region.

Featured in this book:

Multi-Path adventure design: never plays the same twice. Designed for group gaming or you can test your survival instincts, knowledge of The Mutant Epoch™ and wits by solo playing
71 Illustrations
6 Player Handouts
13+ Maps
1 New Creature + variants
8 Pre-generated 3rd rank Player Characters
Plus, SOE (Society of Excavator) Members can freely download all the maps, NPCs, handouts and more

180442.name: Mirror Mirror
180442.description:
This game contains 77 cards.

Goal - To collect the most princes and princesses cards by completing sets that include one abductor card and 5 (non-blocked) mount cards.

Getting started - Deal each player 5 cards and place the rest of the deck in the middle, face down.
Playing the game - Each player, in turn, either draws a card from the top of the deck or takes the top card from the discard pile, and either plays a card or discards a card, according to the following game rules:
1. Every player must begin by placing an abductor card beside him or her.
2. The player then must place a total of five mount cards alongside the abductor card for form a set: horses and dragons if the abductor is a knight, brooms and dragons if the abductor is a witch.
3. When a player has completed a set consisting of an abductor and five mounts, the set is removed from the game and the player chooses a either a prince or a princess card.
4. The player now can start a new set by placing a new abductor card on the table.
5. A player may kill another player's abductor, using a sword card to kill a witch or a magic wand card to kill a knight. Each time any abductor in the game is killed, one prince or a princess card is removed from the game.
6. A player may also kill or destroy another player's mount by using a lance card (used by knights to kill dragons), an ax card (used by knights to destroy brooms), an arrow card (used by witches/knights to kill horses), or a magical ruby card (used by witches to kill dragons).
7. After a mount has been killed or destroyed, the player who suffered the loss may use a gold card to buy a new mount and continue building the set. The mount that was killed or destroyed is not counted as one of the 5 mounts needed to complete a set.
8. A player may also block another player's abductor by playing a block card. To unblock the abductor, the blocked player must place the corresponding unblock card on the block card. Block/unblock card pairs are used as follows: poisoned apple/true love are used on knights only, garlic bottle/magic potion are used on witches only, the three remaining pairs can be used on both knights and witches - castle/pigtails, mice/flute. A mount that has been blocked but that has also been unblocked counts towards completing the set.
9. A player may use a mirror card to look at the cards any one of the other player is holding in his or her hand. The player holding the mirror card may then pick a card from the player's hand, and that player now continues the game with one less card in his or her hand.

The game ends when all the prince cards and the princess cards have been taken or removed from the game.
The winner is the player with the most prince or/and princess cards.

180443.name: Nekrotron
180443.description:
From publisher blurb:

"I SHALL save humanity. Even if it kills them!"

A machine entity determined to defeat Spartan (and by extension, the Sentinels), the PL 11 Nekrotron evolved from a computer virus brought to life through mystic Lemurian super-science. First created by the villainous Grand Emperor in an effort to destroy Spartan's technologic advantage, Nekrotron has long since outgrown his original programming and form. When one body is defeated, he simply uses a back-up program to create a new body, making him one of the most persistent foes in existence.

180444.name: "N" is for "Narrative Abilities"
180444.description:
From publisher blurb:

Story Matters

This entry in the Icons A to Z series looks at variant resolution systems focused more on character role in the story and overall outcomes rather than quantified ability levels, including:

Narrative Abilities: No ability or power levels, just qualities and a roll of the dice.
Automatic Successes and Failures
Narrative Damage: Including options for strain and recovery
Consequences: Trading a lasting effect to shrug off some damage




Create the kind of narrative play style you want for your Icons game!

180445.name: The Ecclesiast (Magus Archetype)
180445.description:
From publisher blurb:

This issue introduces a new archetype for the Magus class. The Ecclesiast twists the magus character to the side of the divine, combining the magus' unique combat abilities with the ability to cast divine spells and channel energy.

180446.name: Doomtown: Reloaded – Nightmare at Noon
180446.description:
Description from the publisher:

The Sloane Gang has called out Sheriff Dave and his deputies to an epic showdown! Bullets (among other things) will fly! Plus the Morgans have something that Ivor Hawley wants...and neither is letting go without a fight.

Doomtown: Reloaded – Nightmare at Noon, the sixth Saddlebag Expansion for Doomtown: Reloaded, features a complete playset of cards, expanding your options for takin’ over Gomorra, no matter your play style.

180447.name: Byzance an 800
180447.description:
Byzance An 800 is a French language supplement for the Call of Cthulhu role playing game.

Explore the ancient cities of Carthage, Libya or Egypt. Discover the splendor of Byzantium and the ambitions of its rivals the Carolingians, the Abbasid Caliphate, and the Sassanid Empire. Live amid historical sites. Meet their dignitaries and common people. Chat about their spiritual traditions, take part in political events, and challenge the unspeakable arrogance of worship! Travel through time to year-800 Byzantium, the myth at the heart of history.

The book presents an important historical component that describes the Byzantine Empire from the ninth century on the shores of the Mediterranean: events, civilizations, and cultures. It also proposes new rules compatible with the 6th edition of Call of Cthulhu to manage Conviction and religious fervor, and the consequences of sin. Spiritual traditions offer an alternative magic Myth for all religions of the time.More importantly, it reveals the secrets of the world and reveals why ancient gods are back.

The book also offers an original campaign, during which you will have to defeat the curse of Nitocris.

(trans from French)

180448.name: La Isla Misteriosa
rpg: Aventuras en la Marca del Este
180448.description:
Portada:

Más allá de las Islas Piratas, en los mares del sur, se dice que hay una isla misteriosa, siempre envuelta en una densa bruma,fría cual sudario de muerto, donde aguardan criaturas monstruosas, extraños artefactos y reliquias de otrora. ¿Quién será valiente como para explorarla y descubrir sus secretos?

Contraportada:


Modulo para perdonajes de nivel 4-6 **



Este módulo ha sido especialmente diseñado para usarse con el reglamento de Aventuras en la Marca del Este. No obstante, podrá ser empleado con otros juegos similares con relativa facilidad y aplicando pocos cambios, incluyendo la quinta edición del juego de rol de fantasía por antonomasia.

Esta aventura trata de emular los viejos módulos que aparecieron en su día para el juego que Aventuras en la Marca del Este clona, como homenaje a un estilo muy particular y querido de entender esta afición, así como una no disimulada pretensión de establecer una línea de aventuras clásicas, con el aroma inconfundible de antaño, sencillas y adaptables, sin pretensiones, como aquellas que jugábamos hace ya más de veinte años

180451.name: DEADHUNTER
180451.description:
Contraportada:
"En el siglo XIV, una terrible plaga de zombis asoló toda Europa, acabando con más de la mitad de la población. Como bien sabéis, lo que hoy en día conocemos como La Peste Negra fue en realidad la mayor plaga zombi de nuestros tiempos. El Vaticano combatió la amenaza con sus Cruzados, y sus Inquisidores se encargaron de ocultar lo ocurrido. Cuando, en 1666, la ciudad de Londres fue ocupada por 100.000 zombis, los Cruzados no aparecieron. Los aterrorizados líderes del país decidieron entonces crear la Royal Deadhunter Force. Durante siglos, la Royal Deadhunter Force ha sido la mayor y más potente fuerza de choque contra la amenaza zombi, aunque, en los últimos años, nuestras filas se han visto diezmadas y, misteriosamente, las plagas zombis han aumentado en exceso.»
«Algo extraño está ocurriendo, y solo el Vaticano tiene las respuestas. Debe ser algo terrible, ya que los Cruzados vuelven a estar en pie de guerra…"
-- Comunicado oficial de Alexander de Lourdes, Bibliotecario Jefe de la Catedral de San Pablo.

Deadhunter: El juego de rol zombicida y conspiranoico te sumerge en eun mundo de violencia gratuita aderezada con tripas, sangre y algo de masa encefálica, con secretos, mentiras y confabulaciones como acompañamiento. ¡Toda una delicatessen para los investigadores más paranoicos! Ármate con un fusil, un bate de baseball o la escobilla del váter, y lánzate a por esos malditos muertos vivientes. Métete en el papel de un deadhunter, de un cruzado, de un siervo de Dios o de un pobre diablo y prepárate para acabar con todos los zombis con los que te cruces... ¡si no acaban antes ellos contigo!


English translation by Google
Back Cover:
"In the fourteenth century, a terrible plague of zombies swept across Europe, killing more than half of the population. As you know, what we know today as The Black Death was actually the largest zombie plague of our times. The Vatican fought the threat with Crusaders and Inquisitors took care to hide what had happened. When, in 1666, the City of London was occupied by 100,000 zombies, the Crusaders did not appear. The terrified country's leaders then decided to create the Royal Deadhunter Force. For centuries, the Royal Deadhunter Force has been the largest and most powerful striking force against the zombie threat, though, in recent years, our ranks have been decimated and, mysteriously, the zombies pests have increased excessively. "
"Something strange is happening, and only the Vatican has the answers. It must be something terrible, and the Crusaders are back on the warpath ... "
- Official Release of Alexander of Lourdes, Chief Librarian of the Cathedral of St. Paul.

Deadhunter: The game conspiranoico role zombicida and immerses you in the world of gratuitous violence eun seasoned with guts, blood and some brains, with secrets, lies and conspiracies as accompaniment. Quite a delicatessen for researchers paranoid! Arm yourself with a rifle, a baseball bat or toilet brush, and hit by those cursed undead. Slip into the role of a Deadhunter, a cross, a servant of God or a poor devil and get ready to kill all the zombies with crosses you ... if you do not finish them before!

180452.name: Mili KK
180452.description:
Contraportada:

Mili KK: el juego de rol de la puta mili

Atención bulto, acaba de nacer el primer juego de rol para Papas, tíos y abuelotes nostálgicos.
Mili KK el juego de rol, incluye todas las reglas y ambientación necesaria para jugar miles de aventuras en la Puta Mili. Siente como poco a poco vas perdiendo moral con el riesgo de acabar toquemao. Lo mejor: birlarle el carro al coronel y bajarse a las fiestas del pueblo a pegarse una buena cogorcia.

Incluye tres misiones y muchas ideas de aventura.

180453.name: Barrio Xino: Biombo del Señó Polisía
180453.description:
Contraportada:

Incluye el Biombo del Señó Polisía (Pantalla del Master) y un suplemento con nuevas reglas sobre la "Seguridá Sosiá", un puñado de "Penejotas" y una aventura llamada "Ruta 69: En el desierto Dalmería nadie escuchará tus gritos (Sangre, sudó y espagueti güenster)"

180454.name: Épica Kinki
180454.description:
Contraportada:

¡Mu buenas, caballeros y caballeras, y bienveníos una vez más al universo barrioxinero! ¡donde las calles güelen a pólvora y la épica kinki da lugá a Pejotas que caminan al filo de la navaja, lushando por sobreviví en la jungla dasfalto! (¡Y grasias a et.te suplemento, los Pejotas se van a poné hat.tal culo de cami ná al filo de la navaja, os lo garantiso!).En él podréis encontrá lo siguiente:

- ¡nuevas profesiones pa dar lugá a singulares y sicotrópicos Pejotas! ¡Enfréntate a hordas denloquesíos guiris en un campin de la costa, o vive una vida nómada y a salto de mata, recorriendo inóspitos pueblos y siniestras carreteras comarcales llevando tu espectáculo de ventriloquía a Hinojosa del Duque, por desir algo!

- ¡el "manual del buen shoriso"!¡gradúate en la ejcuela de la calle y forja tu leyenda!

- ¡un completo sistema de reglas pa resolver los encuentros secsuales de vuet.tros héroes, que tan frecuentes son en las partidas de Barrio Xino y con lo que, por fin, el género porno tiene su representasión en nuet.tro amado mundo del rol! (¡incluye tabla de pifias, avisaos et.táis!)

- ¡tres módulos salvajes y desfasaos que harán las delisias de los directores de juego má ecsigentes (y má punkis, eso sí), y en los que tratamos sin pudó tres polémicos temas: secso, juegos de rol y religión!

Resumiendo: ¡un festival del quince, nen!

180455.name: MOCHOS: Ziquitaque Nau
180455.description:
Contraportada:

"¡Tu faccion de necesita!
Eres un Mocho y posees capacidades especiales que debes poner al servicio de los tuyos: nos debes tu existencia, pues nosotros te fabricamos.
Únete a la guerra interminable y lucha con todas as armas que el genoma, las factorías y los laboratorios ponen a tu disposición."

MOCHOS: Ziquitaque Nau es un juego de rol de ultraviolencia y humor desenfrenado, a medio camino entre los dibujos animados y el cine bélico. En este libreto básico encontrarás todo lo que necesitas para jugar (excepto un par de dados de diez caras, lápices, papel y un grupo de amigos): reglas flexibles de combate y creación de personajes, siete tipos de Mochos con capacidades especiales, toda la información necesaria sobre el disparatado universo de los mochos y montones de erratas.


English translation by Google
Back Cover:

"Your faction of need!
You're a Mocho and possess special abilities that you must put in the service of yours: you owe your existence to us, because we will make.
Join the endless war and struggle with all the weapons as genome, factories and laboratories put at your disposal. "

Mocho: Ziquitaque Nau is an RPG of ultra-violence and unbridled humor, halfway between the cartoon and war movies. In this basic script you will find everything you need to play (except a couple of ten-sided dice, pencils, paper and a group of friends): flexible rules of engagement and creating characters, seven types of Mochos Features, whole necessary information about the crazy world of the polled and lots of errors.

180456.name: Psionics and the Mystic
180456.description:
From Introduction:

This month, Unearthed Arcana goes big with a look at the first draft of psionics rules for fifth edition D&D. This article provides a quick overview of how psionics works and presents a new class — the mystic. Similar to how the cleric represents a wide variety of divine magic users, the mystic encapsulates a variety of characters who wield psionic power.

Using the options presented in this article, you can play a mystic to 5th level, following one of two psionic orders and training in that order’s unique disciplines. Following the Order of the Awakened allows you to create a mystic who manipulates the minds and awareness of other creatures, and who can tap into unseen psionic power both in and out of combat. Following the Order of the Immortal allows you to create a mystic who focuses psionic power in combat, similar to the battlemind or psychic warrior of previous editions. Other options for the mystic will appear as the playtest progresses and we gain valuable feedback about the class's mechanics in play.

As usual, you can expect a survey asking for feedback on these draft rules in about a month or so. At this point, we’re not necessarily tied to any of these options. This effort is merely a first draft to gauge where we should start and what kind of approach to psionics in fifth edition will work best.

180457.name: El Rol de los Idiotas
180457.description:
El Rol de los Idiotas, viene de la mano de José A. Márquez Periano (creador del Rol de los Panchitos), con dibujos y cómic inédito en el interior de Jesús Martínez del Vas (Bok, Epichode I y II, El Jovit, El señor de los Panchitos).

Siguiendo la estela del Rol de los Panchitos, este nuevo juego vuelve a utilizar el sistema de juego “Ki Vende”, reglas paródicas del famoso sistema D20 d D&D, utilizado ahora para parodiar el mundo de los Superhéroes y el estilo de vida norteamericano.

En sus páginas, los jugadores podrán jugar e interpretar a héroes algo idiotas, y harán frente contra los villanos en la ciudad de Doritopolis (una parodia de la ciudad de Nueva York y San Francisco). El alcalde Dorito tratará de luchar contra la peligrosa organización de Kingman, el villano más poderoso de la ciudad que tiene en su poder todos los restaurantes de comida rápida de la ciudad.

Dark Devil, el profesor Javier, Wolverine, Zuperman y otros tratarán de luchar contra las fuerzas del mal… ¡suponiendo que su estupidez se lo permita!


English translation by Google
The Role of Idiots, comes from the hand of Jose A. Marquez Periano (creator of the Role of Panchitos), with drawings and unpublished comic inside of Jesus Martinez del Vas (Bok, Epichode I and II, The Jovit, The Lord of the Panchitos).

In the wake of the Role of Panchitos, this new game reuses the gameplay "Ki Sell" parodic rules of the famous D20 system d D & D, now used to parody the world of superheroes and the American way of life.

In its pages, players can play and play some idiots heroes and the villains will face in the city of Doritopolis (a parody of the city of New York and San Francisco). Mayor Dorito aim to combat the dangerous organization of Kingman, the most powerful villain of the city that is in possession of all the fast food restaurants in the city.

Dark Devil, Professor Xavier, Wolverine, Zuperman and others will try to fight the forces of evil ... assuming your stupidity forbid!

180458.name: El Rol de los Panchitos (Rol of the Matutano's)
rpg: El Rol de los Panchitos (Rol of the Matutano's)
180458.description:
¡BIENVENIDOS A LA TIERRA DE ENMEDIO!

embárcate en la mayor aventura jamás contada. Una lucha de las torpes fuerzas del bien contra el todopoderoso Zaurón. Adéntrate en la tierra de elfos horteras de Riverplate, lucha contra las terribles fuerzas pringadas de Golfor y vence a los sirvientes del lado oscuro. Acompaña a Tamarit, Bulbo, Frigo y Trancazos en sus aventuras encarnándote en tu propio personaje.

El juego de Rol de los Panchitos te ofrece la oportunidad de sumergirte en la obra cómica de Jesús Martinez del Vas: "El Señor de los Panchitos" y "El Jovit". Ahora tenéis la llave para disfrutar en esta desternillante ambientación e interpretar el papel de cualquier personaje, el único límite será tu propia imaginación. En este libro está todo lo que necesitas para empezar a jugar.

El juego del Rol de los Panchitos incluye:

Un nuevo sistema de juego completamente nuevo, "El Ki-Vende", utilizando un dado de 30 caras como soporte.
Toda la geografía de la Tierra Denmedio
Ayudas de juego, monstruos, seis profesiones, cuatro razas, y decenas de reglas opcionales.
Un cómic de 4 páginas y decenas de ilustraciones de JMV, todas éllas inéditas."

WELCOME TO THE LAND OF ENMEDIO!

embark on the greatest adventure ever told. An awkward struggle against the forces of good Zauron almighty. Delve into the land of elves Riverplate tacky, fighting the terrible pringadas Golfor forces and defeat the dark side servants. All the geography of the Earth Denmedio
